item.title: Changing Well Items To Exp
item.dc:creator: @wrath0fgufix wrath0fgufix
item.description:
@wrath0fgufix wrote:

[quote=“zero1234321zero, post:1, topic:249003”] } else if (useItemID == 995 && atObjectID == 2380)// Chest
if(actionTimer == 0)
if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 10000000)==false) {
sendMessage(“You Need 10m to drop in the chest”);
}
else if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 10000000)==true) {
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995),10000000);
sendMessage(“You Gambeled And Won 250k Exp In Strength”);
addItem(Item2.randomwell(), 1);
sendMessage(“Unfortanatly you need to wait 10 minutes to make another wish!”);
actionTimer = 600;

thats the code for the chest
^
but for item2.java what should i change for this ^

public static int well[] = {1123,1161,1331,4153,1305,6585,6528,15352,4087,145,3749,1712,7158,};

public static int randomwell()
{
	return well[(int)(Math.random()*well.length)];
}

above is the code for the well, but to make it chest that gives 250k exp in strength what should i do??

PLEASE HELP[/quote]

so that is your code for what you have it at right now?
